title: PDF Index
description: Contains indexing information for an army PDF for Warhammer 40k 10th ed

associated_file.description: path to the PDF file associated to this indexing file

includes.description: names (not paths) to other YAML indexing files that contains datasheets for that army

includes_allies.description: names (not paths) to other YAML indexing files that contains datasheets for allies of that army (e.g. Imperial Knights for Space Marines)

army_rule.description: page number or page range that contains the army rule

detachments.description: list of the indexing information for the different detachements offered by the army

rule.description: page number of page range that contains the detachement rule

stratagems.description: page number of page range that contains the detachement stratagems

enhancements.description: page number of page range that contains the detachement enhancements

armory_full_pages.description: page number or page range that contains extra information about the army weaponry (only full (vertical) page(s) here)

armory_half_pages.description: page number or page range that contains extra information about the army weaponry (only half (horizontal) page(s) here)
